thread.title: Easy reach to CDG airport by transit
thread.title_full: Easy reach to CDG airport by transit - Review of Libertel Gare du Nord Suede, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: louise B
title: Easy reach to CDG airport by transit
text: You can walk from gare du Nord to the hotel with a suitcase on wheels. The rooms are very clean and this time with a superior room, I felt very pampered, slippers and robe too. Higher floosr are quieter. A great stop for a quick Paris visit without breaking the bank.
